setStrat(IUpdateStrategy) - Static method in class model.SwitcherStrategy
This function changes the strategy of all switcher balls to that of the parameter.
setSwitcherStrategy(IStrategyFac) - Method in class model.BallWorldModel
This function sets the switcher balls strategy to the one made by the input.
setSwitcherStrategy(TDropListItem) - Method in interface view.IView2ModelAdapter
This function will change the current strategy of the switcher balls to whatever strategy is made by the factory in the parameter.

StraightStrategy - Class in model
This class defines a Straight Strategy which defines a movement strategy for a ball that just moves by changing it's location by its velocity components.
StraightStrategy() - Constructor for class model.StraightStrategy
 
strat - Variable in class model.Ball
This is a private variable that holds the current movement strategy of the ball.
strategy - Static variable in class model.SwitcherStrategy
This private variable is the current strategy for all balls that use the Switcher Strategy.
SwellStrategy - Class in model
This class defines a Swell Strategy which defines a movement strategy for a ball that grows it in size, and once it reaches a certain size, it changes colors, and then shrinks slowly and repeats.
SwellStrategy() - Constructor for class model.SwellStrategy
 
switcherStrat - Static variable in interface model.IStrategyFac
This factory creates a new Switcher Strategy.
SwitcherStrategy - Class in model
This class defines a Switcher Strategy which defines a strategy for a ball that can change by updating the strategy.
SwitcherStrategy() - Constructor for class model.SwitcherStrategy
